directions: Stir the mangos, tomatoes, garlic, shallot, green chile pepper, lime juice, pineapple juice, olive oil, and salt together in a bowl; refrigerate 1 hour to allow the flavors to mingle before serving.
ingredients: 2 mangos (preferably honey mangos) - peeled, seeded, and diced
2 large roma (plum) tomatoes, seeded and diced
1 green chile pepper, seeded and diced
title: Mmmm Mango Salsa
